column2: Fixed `ResultOfAssignmentUsed` inspection, when it's not in method

column3: Feel free to check the examples in the provided tests, e.g. https://github.com/paplorinc/intellij-community/blob/ResultOfAssignmentUsed/plugins/groovy/test/org/jetbrains/plugins/groovy/lang/highlighting/GrResultOfAssignmentUsedTest.groovy

org.jetbrains.plugins.groovy.refactoring.convertToJava.CodeBlockGenerationTest and org.jetbrains.plugins.groovy.refactoring.convertToJava.FileGenerationTest are failing after this change.
This is related to another bug, I'll fix it by myself.
Meanwhile the PR is OK, I'll merge it after I fix that bug.
You may want to fix commit message btw :)
Fixed `ResultOfAssignmentUsed` inspection, when it's not in method
